runs.comm: good length on middle and off and tucked to the on side
that hurried on to him, he was too early on the pull and the ball struck his elbow and dropped to the off side
he drifts wide down the leg side, looks to tuck it away
awesome back foot punch, this was a length ball, moved away and he had the room to stand tall and punch it wide of point and cover, stand and deliver
shorter and he defends this high on the bat, Porterfield runs and heads back
bowls it on the stumps and he checks his shot
this was pitched up outside off and he gets forward and scoops it over cover, it was too wide outside off
keeps it nice and straight and he softly taps it to the off side
he totally lost control of that one, really wide down the leg side, too much for the wicketkeeper as well
spanked that! This was short and wide and Porterfield stood back and cut that with ease wide of point, sped off the bat
not so convincing this time, skidded on him and he gets an outside edge down to third man
he stays beside the line and taps it towards point
this was fuller and angling across and he drives this one down to cover
this one kept low outside off and he managed to get some wood on that, thick outside edge wide of the keeper and third man dives in vain
keeps it full and straight and he shows the full face of the bat and defends
this was full and moving away and he chases it and gets an outside edge to third man
he stays beside the line and punches it to the off side and sets off
cramped him for room, pinned him on the back foot as he defended that
nicely punched down the ground! This was pitched up outside off and he showed the full face and punched it not too hard, mid-off was a spectator
slower ball outsode off and he dabs it to the off side
he stays beside the line and pushes it to point
doesn't give him much room, he stays behind the line and defends
loses control of it there as he strays too wide down the leg side
this was full and moving across and punched to the off side
keeps it on a good length outside off and he punched it to the off side
nice line and length, moves back in a bit and he can only drive it down the track
tossed up from round the wicket and he stays back to defend
tossed up and he gets forward and drives to the off side
flatter ball and he gets forward to defend
quicker one and he drives to mid-off
slices this one and well stopped at point but not enough to prevent the single
he goes back and punches this one down to cover
a few inches more and that would have knocked the stumps! He was down the pitch to slam it to the off side and got an inside edge that just missed the stumps and raced to fine leg
he goes back and tucks it to the on side
stays back and punches it to cover
he goes for the pull but doesn't control this one, he miscues it but it falls short of the fielder at deep midwicket
nicely flicked away, this was swinging towards the pads and he used his wrists well and worked it wide of midwicket

a lot happened there! He pushed this towards mid-off and hurried the single, Joyce dived and he got there before the direct hit, unfortunately for UAE the throw deflected off the stumps and struck the helmet near the wicketkeeper so that's five penalty runs
he goes back and cuts to point
he gets forward and tucks it to midwicket

the keeper Patil seems to have missed a run out, he tries to sweep and the ball drops in front of the wicketkeeper, Patil fails to knock down the stumps with the ball before the batsman can make his ground
goes back and cuts it wide of point
Porterfield looks to play the reverse sweep, the ball hits his pad, there's an appeal but the ball pitched outside leg
stays back and punches it to the off side
flat six! There were cries of 'catch it' after the ball sped off the bat but the fielder at deep midwicket could only watch, tossed up and he gets on his knee and slogs, clean hit
this time Joyce comes down the track and gets to the pitch of it and chips it wide of long-on, good placement
comes forward and drives to mid-off
flatter one and he flicks it to square leg
tossed up and he stays back and chops it down the pitch, a part of the bottom of the bat is chipped off
gets forward and pushes it to long-off
goes back and chops it on the pitch again, lobs and drops in front of the keeper
he makes room and cuts him hard to the off side
gets forward and pushes it down the track
he stays behind the line and steers it wide of point
this was banged in short down the leg side and he backed out of the hook, the umpire was happy with that
down the leg side and he gets a pad on it as it rolls wide of the keeper
chases a full and wide one outside off, beaten
digs out a fast fuller delivery and takes a single to mid-off
goes back at the crease and dabs it to the off side and sets off for a quick single
he plays the reverse sweep and places it just wide of short third man
they're pinching the quick singles there, softly dabbed towards short third man and the calling and understanding is good
he gets forward and drives him towards long-off
he stays back and punches it down to long-off
this was fuller and flatter and he drives him wide of cover
this one skidded through and he made a hint of room and dabbed it towards point
fuller delivery and he makes room and drills it down to long-off
the shorter one this time and he swivels and looks to pull to fine leg but that goes off the glove
an overthrow! This was tucked towards midwicket and Porterfield was off the crease and had to hurry back to beat the throw, the fielder backing up couldn't collect cleanly
slapped away! This was hammered in short, Porterfield stood tall and slapped that high and long over deep midwicket
slower ball and he gets forward and pushes it down to long-off
this was full and wide and he drives wide of cover, the fielder at deep cover does very well to slide and cut it off
Joyce gifts his wicket away, this was banged in short and he fetched it from outside off and looked to pull in front of square, Khurram back-pedalled and took the catch at midwicket
fires it full and he drills it down to long-off
it's a fast and full delivery and he drives down the track

another wicket gifted away! This was only a fractionally short and he swiveled and pulled it towards deep square leg, the fielder takes it quite close to the rope, O'Brien knew he was in trouble the moment it left the bat
good length on leg and he tucks it to square leg
this one moves away and beats him, Poynter looked a bit lost there as he nearly edged it
gets it to shape away again, Poynter pokes his bat out at it
that was in the slot for him! This was pitched up further and gave him the width he needed to bash that along the ground wide of mid-off and cover
and follows that up with a false shot, this was not shirt enough to cut and he was beaten

timber! UAE are hitting back but is it too late? Full credit to Javed here, this was a lovely inswinging yorker that would have made his coach Aqib Javed proud, Poynter was beaten for movement, played all around it and failed to get his bat down, the ball brushes his pad first, the leg stump lands a couple of yards back
drifts on the pads and he works it to the on side
10.23pm he paddles it to fine leg and the lights have taken a break again! What's going on here, seriously? This must be rather embarassing for the organisers
